script.name: PCC Staff Setup Big Sur
script.info:
Uses DEP Notify Starter Script
https://github.com/jamf/DEPNotify-Starter
script.notes:
Modified 10/04/2021 - Removed Firefox
Modified 09/15/2021 - Updated for FireEye
Modified 05/03/2021 - Updated McAfee version
Modified 12/18/2020 - Added checks for PCC IT account - Disabled installation of Adobe Flash, Adobe Air, and Java
Modified 11/06/2020 - Changed Firefox trigger from installfirefoxESR to installfirefox
Modified 11/06/2020 - Changed Computer Name requirement from Mandatory to Optional
Modified 05/19/2020 - Added MS Office 2019 Trigger Policy
Modified 02/28/2020 - Adding McAfee Agent Trigger Policy compatible with Mac OS Catalina ============================ Created 12/05/2019 By Yeshua Ervine
